Uses of Package

Packages that use edu.cuny.ai.learning

Classes in edu.cuny.ai.learning used by edu.cuny.ai.learning
AbstractLearner
           
ActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy framework used by DiscreteLearner to choose an action out of multiple discrete actions.
AdaptiveReturnUpdatingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions.
ContinuousLearner
          A learning algorithm that outputs a continuous signal.
DiscreteLearner
          A learner that learns a discrete number of different actions.
EpsilonGreedyLearner
          This is deprecated.
ExposedStimuliResponseLearner
          This interface defines additional methods for debugging purpose only.
ExposedStimuliResponseLearnerTest
           
Learner
          Classes implementing this interface indicate that they implement a learning algorithm.
LearningPolicy
          An interface that should be implemented by all policies for learners.
MDPLearner
          Classes implementing this interface implement learning algorithms for markoff descision processes.
MimicryLearner
          A learner that attempts to adjust its output to match a training signal.
MultiActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy framework to choose multiple actions out of a set of discrete actions based on expected returns of these actions.
ReturnUpdatingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions.
RothErevLearner
           A class implementing the Roth-Erev learning algorithm.
SelfKnowledgable
          Classes implementing this interface indicate that they know if their output is good enough to be used.
SoftmaxLearner
          This is deprecated.
StimuliResponseLearner
          Classes implementing this interface implement myopic stimuli-response reinformcement learning algorithms.
WidrowHoffLearner
          An implementation of the Widrow-Hoff learning algorithm for 1-dimensional training sets.
